definition: A process of assigning a numerical or qualitative value to something, typically used to evaluate or assess the quality, worth, or performance of a particular object, service, or experience. It is commonly employed in various contexts, such as customer reviews, product ratings, performance appraisals, or academic assessments.

examples.german: Die Bewertung des Films war sehr positiv.
examples.english: The review of the movie was very positive.

examples.german: Die Bewertung der Arbeit wurde vom Chef gelobt.
examples.english: The evaluation of the work was praised by the boss.

examples.german: Die Bewertung der Produkte erfolgt nach strengen Kriterien.
examples.english: The assessment of the products is done according to strict criteria.

examples.german: Die Bewertung der Leistung war fair und gerecht.
examples.english: The appraisal of the performance was fair and just.

examples.german: Die Bewertung der Situation ist schwierig.
examples.english: The assessment of the situation is difficult.
